Self.Wiki: This map object represents a treasure within the map.

TreasurePartName.Wiki: The part referenced by the treasure event.

ItemLot1.Wiki: The item lot to award when this treasure is acquired.

ItemLot2.Wiki: The item lot to award when this treasure is acquired. Rarely used.

ItemLot3.Wiki: The item lot to award when this treasure is acquired. Rarely used.

ActionButtonParamID.Wiki: Adds the designated Action Button param to the Treasure pickup

InChest.Wiki: If ON, this treasure is within a chest, meaning the glow will be hidden until the chest is triggered and the action prompt is changed.

StartDisabled.Wiki: If ON, this treasure is hidden by default.

EnableSecondaryItemlot.Wiki: Toggles to Item Lot #2 when this flag is ON.
